mapper.select: SELECT MIN(reservationId) AS reservationId, userId, movieTitle, theaterName, scheduleTime, GROUP_CONCAT(seatNumber ORDER BY seatNumber ASC) AS seatNumbersStr, bookingTime, movieId FROM reservation WHERE userId = #{userId} GROUP BY bookingTime, movieTitle, theaterName, scheduleTime, userId, movieId ORDER BY bookingTime DESC
